contentrichtext.text: '''Kakianako Nariki''' (born December 28, 1982) is an [[Kiribati|I-Kiribati]] athlete specializing in the 100 metres. Participating in the [[2004 Summer Olympics]], he achieved seventh place in his 100 metres heat, thus failing to make it through to the second round. ==References== {{Reflist}} [http://www.sports-reference.com/olympics/athletes/na/kakianako-nariki-1.html Sports Reference] {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Nariki, Kakianako | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Kiribati sprinter | DATE OF BIRTH = December 28, 1982 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Nariki, Kakianako}} [[Category:1982 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Kiribati sprinters]] [[Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2004 Summer Olympics]] [[Category:Olympic athletes of Kiribati]] {{Kiribati-athletics-bio-stub}}
